src:
Jadwal Siaran Langsung Liga 1 2019 Jumat: Arema Vs Madura United
07 Nov 2019, 22:34 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal Liga 1 pekan ke-27 pada Jumat, 8 November 2019, aka menampilkan satu pertandingan: Arema FC Vs Madura United.
Arema FC, yang akan menjadi tuan rumah, saat ini menempati posisi keenam klasemen dengan nilai 38 dari 25 laga. Mereka tertinggal 6 poin dari lawannya yang ada di posisi kedua.
Dalam lima pertemuan kedua tim sebelumnya Madura United menang tiga kali, sedangkan Arema hanya menang sekali. Duel terakhir mereka terjadi pada 20 Juli, yang dimenangi Madura United 1-0.
Jadwal Liga 1
Jumat, 08 November 2019Arema FC vs Madura United | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Sabtu, 09 November 2019Tira Persikabo vs Persebaya | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Hasil Liga 1 pekan ke-27 Persipura Jayapura 1-3 Bhayangkara FCSemen Padang 2-2 Persija JakartaPersib Bandung 2-1 PSIS SemarangPSM Makassar 2-1 Kalteng PutraPSS Sleman 0-0 Bali UnitedBorneo FC 1-1 Badak LampungPersela Lamongan 0-0 Barito Putera.

text:
Schedule for Live League 1 2019 Friday: Arema Vs Madura United
07 Nov 2019, 22:34 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - League Schedule 1 of Week 27 on Friday, November 8, 2019, aka featuring one match: Arema FC v Madura United.
Arema FC, which will host, currently occupies the sixth position of the standings with a value of 38 from 25 matches. They are 6 points behind their opponents in second place.
In five meetings the two previous teams Madura United won three times, while Arema won only once. Their last duel took place on July 20, which Madura United won 1-0.
League 1 Schedule
Friday, November 8, 2019Arema FC vs Madura United | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Saturday, November 9, 2019 Persikabo vs Persebaya | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
